text.text: 1. Woman: Didn’t I just see you in the library an hour ago?
options: As a matter of fact, I was returning a book.
Yes, you can find it in the reference section.
I don’t think I’ll have enough time to do that.
Actually, I think I can get there a little earlier.

text.text: 2. Man: Where is the nearest bus stop?
options: I can help you find it.

text.text: 3. Woman: How do I contact customer service?
options: Yes, you're allowed to do that.

text.text: 4. Woman: I'm afraid I'm not available this evening.
5. Man: Isn't the post office open today?
options: I think he's come home already.

text.text: 6. Woman: If you need me, just text.
options: I can help you with that.
You don't need any more information.
You have a lot of questions, don't you?
You haven't given me your number yet.

text.text: 7. Woman: So the store is open for business all weekend?
options: Yes, there is a major power outage.
Yes, it's closed all day on Sunday.
Yes, they're having a huge sale.

text.text: 8. Man: Did you attend the seminar?
1. Woman: Who is the new manager?
options: I’m unsure, but I can find out.

text.text: 2. Man: When is the due date for the report?
options: Please wait while I look that up.
No, I have another due date.

text.text: 3. Man: I’m going to get some groceries.
options: The cinema is not open today.

text.text: 4. Woman: Would you like a copy of my notes?
options: The break is in an hour.

text.text: 5. Man: Sami and Layla are on their way to the café.
6. Woman: I'd like to hear your thoughts on the job candidates.
options: I’ll set up a meeting for us to talk.

text.text: 7. Woman: How much does expedited shipping cost?
8. Man: If you need more information, contact Ms. Lee.
options: What is her role in the company?
You ask a lot of questions.

text.text: 1. Man: How can I get this light to work?
options: The lighter one is over there.
There's a switch on the back wall.
I prefer to work at home.

text.text: 2. Woman: I'm not available tomorrow.
options: Let's try to get there early.
What's a better day for you?
It's not on my schedule either.
I was in a meeting last night.

text.text: 3. Man: The campus talent contest will be held next Saturday evening.
options: I can hold that for you.
Stage lighting is usually very hot.
My roommate is a talented basketball player.
Do you know who the judges will be?

text.text: 4. Man: What time do I need to pick up Michael from the train station?
options: Don't worry about it--I'll get him.
He said he prefers the window seat.
The station now has a snack shop.
There's road construction near the entrance.

text.text: 5. Woman: Isn't the grocery store open late tonight?
6. Woman: Did you bring the identification documents?
options: They are in the blue folder.

text.text: 7. Man: Wait, isn't the concert tomorrow night?
8. Woman: I'm not available this afternoon.
1. Woman: Who is responsible for the project timeline?
2. Woman: Why did the team meeting get canceled?
3. Man: Can you assist me with my science report?
options: Let me know what you think.
What exactly do you need help with?

text.text: 4. Man: I'm not sure about the current plan.
5. Man: If you need help, ask Ms. Johnson.
6. Woman: What time does the event start?
7. Man: Who is hosting the party tonight?
8. Man: Let's go hiking this weekend.
1. Man: Does the building have a parking garage?
options: No, I haven't received it yet.
Yes, it’s just around the corner.

text.text: 2. Woman: Didn't you book a trip to Australia?
options: No, the airport is on the right.
I'd be happy to sell tickets for the fundraiser.
I'm going to New Zealand instead.

text.text: 3. Woman: Who's conducting the safety training?
options: Elizabeth would be the person to ask.
We'll be gathering in the main conference room.
Did Robert place the food order?
The train station closes at midnight.

text.text: 4. Man: Can I purchase this shirt in a different size?
options: Are you looking for the same color?
Yes, we stock a variety of styles of pants.
All of our stores are open on Sundays.
The store will be remodeled this summer.

text.text: 5. Man: Why did Sharon relocate to Belfast?
options: The suitcases can be stored overhead.
Because I have a doctor's appointment.
I know you have some vacation time coming up.
She was offered a new role.

text.text: 6. Woman: How much do these watches cost?
options: Did you watch the game yesterday?
They start at a hundred dollars.
These models feature a new display.
The admission fee has gone up by twenty dollars.

text.text: 7. Woman: Where can I buy a charger for my phone?
options: Battery recycling is available on Saturdays.
The cost of those phones just went up.
There's a shopping center a few minutes from here.
The cashier charged me too much.

text.text: 8. Man: What streaming services do you like to watch shows on?
options: I don't have a cleaning service.
I'm too busy to watch anything right now.
The stream runs behind the house.

text.text: 1. Man: Don't you have class right now?
options: My professor is out this week.
I don't think I received one.

text.text: 2. Woman: Have you met our new neighbor?
options: Yes, I'll drop it off tomorrow.
Not usually at this time of day.

text.text: 3. Woman: Why does my computer keep shutting down?
options: Sure, you can borrow my charging cord.
The door should remain shut and locked.
Because the schedule was changed at the last minute.
Sounds like it needs to be repaired.

text.text: 4. Man: Why didn't Andy come to the business dinner?
5. Man: Should we repaint the classrooms in that building?
options: The library is past the cafeteria.
I think it’s time to do it.

text.text: 6. Woman: Would you mind making copies of the syllabus for me?
options: I'll put them on your desk.
Yes, I'll pass along the message.
I like that new coffee maker.

text.text: 7. Woman: You managed to get to the concert, didn't you?
options: I was able to make it to the trade show.
I do not play any instruments.
My manager agreed to the new schedule.
It was a very long drive.

text.text: 8. Man: Does the restaurant use organic vegetables?
options: The menu features two fish entrées.
The cost of broccoli has increased.
Yes, the natural lighting is lovely.

text.text: 1. Woman: Who's attending the trade show in Dubai?
options: I'm going to the concert with friends.
Sheila and I traded work shifts yesterday.
The location is the same as last year.

text.text: 2. Man: Don't we need to finish the sales report tomorrow?
options: I took vacation time last week.
Which supervisor does Jack report to?
Yes, the annual sale begins tomorrow.
The deadline isn’t until next week.

text.text: 3. Woman: When will the house be put up for sale?
options: She put it up on the shelf.

text.text: 4. Man: The online store offers multiple delivery options, doesn't it?
options: There is only one free option.

text.text: 5. Man: When is the budget meeting?
6. Woman: How long before the furniture arrives?
7. Man: Where can I go for a quick lunch?
options: Anne's on Fourth Street is good.

text.text: 8. Woman: Where is the fashion show next week?
options: At the new convention center downtown.
That play has gotten good reviews.

text.text: 1. Man: Who should present at the research seminar?
2. Woman: Where's the nearest movie theater?
options: I'm not familiar with this area.

text.text: 3. Man: Tom told me he likes playing chess.
options: I’ve never seen him play before.

text.text: 4. Woman: Would you like to join us for a coffee break?
5. Man: Would you rather watch TV or read a book?
6. Woman: Where can I find more printer paper?
7. Man: Can I call you if I have questions about tomorrow's delivery?
8. Woman: I can't figure out how to fix my bicycle.
1.  Man: Who can fix the printer?
2.  Woman: Please update the expense report.
3.  Man: Would you mind turning down the music?
options: I put it on the shelf.

text.text: 4.  Man: It's quite hot, isn't it?
5.  Woman: Why did you leave early?
options: I think that it could be nice.
At some point in the evening.

text.text: 6.  Man: When is the next train to Paris?
7.  Man:  Would you prefer to fly to the conference or take the train?
options: The new one should be better.

How many are there?
Listening Section, Module 1

text.text: 8.  Man: Are you planning to attend the dance performance?
options: I wouldn't want to miss it.

text.text: 1. Woman: Which bus goes to the airport?
2. Woman: Why is the gym closed?
options: Be sure to shut down the equipment.

text.text: 3. Man: Could you proofread this document?
options: Every weekend over the past few months.
Yes, last week at the library.

text.text: 4. Man: Do you mind if I take the aisle seat?
5. Woman: Did you repair your bicycle yourself?
options: That brand has a good reputation.
I took it to a professional.
No, it's not far from here.
Sure, I'll take a look at it.

text.text: 6. Woman: This café just opened for business, didn't it?
7. Man: How do you feel about the new marketing strategy?
options: I don't know if I can attend.

I'd like to visit them.
Listening Section, Module 2

text.text: 8. Woman: Do we need to postpone the software training session?
options: Thank you for letting me know.

text.text: 1.  Man: Is the library open now?
options: No, dinner is at eight p.m.

text.text: 2.  Woman: Could you help me organize these files?
3.  Man:  It looks like you didn't finish the slides for the presentation.
options: Yes, I agree with the manager.

text.text: 4.  Woman: It's quite warm, isn't it?
options: I haven't had a chance to check the schedule.
It's not in the budget for this year.
The hallway lights are out again.
Especially for this time of year.

text.text: 5.  Man: Will you be able to meet the deadline for your research paper?
options: I'm on track to finish on  time.

text.text: 6.  Woman: When is your job interview?
options: It will be in the conference room.
It's been rescheduled to Monday morning.
We went out for lunch afterward.

text.text: 7.  Man: I'm having trouble resetting my password.
options: Let me find the instructions for you.

Set the documents on the table.
Listening Section, Module 1

text.text: 8.  Woman: I can't find the invoice for last month's catering order.
options: Did you check the file folder?
Two copies of the billing statement.
Didn't they offer to write a review?

text.text: 1. Man: Would you mind closing the window?
2. Woman: The seminar meets at eight thirty a.m. on Wednesdays.
options: The bookstore opens at noon on Sundays.

text.text: 3. Man: Have you created the syllabus for the art history course?
options: No, the artwork is being shipped.

text.text: 4. Woman: Where can I find the cafeteria?
5. Man: Who will summarize our team's research findings
options: Emily would do a great job.

text.text: 6. Woman: How do you use this software?
7. Man: Is the café open now?
options:
She is available.
Listening Section, Module 2

text.text: 8. Man: Let's schedule an extra study-group meeting.
1.  Woman: Is the gym open right now?
2.  Woman: Could you help me review this report?
3.  Man: Could you please forward me the e-mail?
4.  Man: It's quite chilly outside, isn't it?
5.  Woman: Did you finalize the proposal?
6.  Man: Is the meeting at ten a.m.?
7.  Man: Where is the nearest pharmacy?
options:
I had a good experience there.
Listening Section, Module 1

text.text: 8.  Man: Which room is the meeting in?
options: The same one as last week.
A lot of people can't make it.
There wasn't enough room for everyone last time.

text.text: 1. Woman: How do you turn on the projector?
options: The images are a little fuzzy.
I think it might be broken.
It printed ten copies by mistake.
I've needed a new monitor for a while.

text.text: 2. Woman: Should we meet today or tomorrow?
options: I will forward it to the team.

text.text: 3. Man: When is the next train to London?
4. Woman: Why did you leave early?
options: I'll add it to the agenda.
I wasn't interested in the second half.
I'll need to check the schedule.

text.text: 5. Woman: Do you prefer tea or coffee?
6. Man: Could you assist with the presentation?
7. Man: Where did you leave the keys?
options:
Under the weather.
Listening Section, Module 2

text.text: 8. Woman: It's really noisy in the lobby, isn't it?
options: I haven't been able to work with them yet.
They don't know how to do it.
It's the first day of the big medical conference.
